response.overview: Through this highly stylized self-portrait, the auteur explores her initiation journey. In everyday life doing regular things, she often starts to act as if she’s on the stage. Maintaining a psychedelic aesthetic, portraying the protagonist’s quest for connection through movement and vibrant moods, reflecting the experimental spirit and gender-fluid love of the '60s.
response.tagline: ANKA is an introspective journey that delves into the theme of 'sensing spatiality: inside and outside.
response.title: Anka
